title: The Collected Stories of Katherine Anne Porter (pdf)
description:
The Collected Stories of Katherine Anne Porter (Harcourt, 1965). 495 pp.

New scan. Searchable pdf (clearscan) with contents in bookmarks, accurate pagination and metadata, etc.

(There's another pdf version of this book around, but it's not very attractive, and I think I saw a place where it's missing some text. The version is this torrent is new and, in my opinion, better.)


description:

Porter's reputation as one of America's most distinguished writers rests chiefly on her superb short stories. This volume includes the collections Flowering Judas; Pale Horse, Pale Rider; and The Leaning Tower, as well as four stories not available elsewhere in book form.

Winner of the National Book Award and the Pulitzer Prize.
